description: DERP Probe monitoring dashboard for single deployment unit. Monitors probe health, latency, and region connectivity across all DERP regions.

panels.description: Number of regions being monitored
panels.title: Monitored Regions

panels.description: Number of regions currently up
panels.title: Healthy Regions

panels.description: Average probe latency across all regions
panels.title: Average Latency

panels.description: Total number of servers being monitored
panels.title: Monitored Servers

panels.description: Probe latency over time by region
panels.title: Probe Latency by Region

panels.description: Probe failure rate by region and class
panels.title: Probe Failures by Region

panels.description: Current status of all monitored regions
panels.title: Region Status

panels.description: Current status of all monitored servers
panels.title: Server Status

panels.description: Detailed probe results showing current status and latency
panels.title: Detailed Probe Results

panels.description: Pod restart count for DERP probe
panels.title: Probe Pod Restarts

panels.description: DERP probe pod status
panels.title: Probe Pod Status

panels.description: CPU usage of DERP probe pod
panels.title: Probe CPU Usage

panels.description: Memory usage of DERP probe pod
panels.title: Probe Memory Usage

panels.description: Resource usage trends for DERP probe pod
panels.title: Probe Resource Usage Trends

panels.description: Network I/O for DERP probe pod
panels.title: Probe Network I/O

panels.description: Probe execution frequency and timing

targets.expr: derpprobe_seconds_total{name=~"$name", region=~"$region", class=~"$class", status="ok"} / derpprobe_attempts_total{name=~"$name", region=~"$region", class=~"$class", status="ok"}

panels.title: Probe Execution Timing

panels.description: Probe pod health and readiness status
panels.title: Probe Pod Health Status

panels.description: DERP probe pod status
panels.title: Probe Pod Status

panels.description: Pod CPU usage
panels.title: Pod CPU Usage

panels.description: Pod memory usage
panels.title: Pod Memory Usage

panels.description: Pod restarts
panels.title: Pod Restarts

panels.description: Probe success rate by class
panels.title: Probe Success Rate by Class

panels.description: Probe duration distribution

targets.expr: derpprobe_seconds_total{name=~"$name", region=~"$region", class=~"$class", status="ok"} / derpprobe_attempts_total{name=~"$name", region=~"$region", class=~"$class", status="ok"}

panels.title: Average Probe Duration

panels.description: Mesh connectivity status between regions
panels.title: DERP Mesh Connectivity

panels.description: Network connectivity test results
panels.title: DERP Server Latency by Region

title: DERP Probe (Deployment)
